alert.note: Alert for Eastern Bergen; Hudson (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 3:21PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT HUDSON AND SOUTHEASTERN BERGEN COUNTIES THROUGH 400 PM EDT... At 320 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hackensack, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hackensack, Bergenfield, Lyndhurst, Rutherford, Secaucus, Ridgefield, Kearny, Englewood, Oradell, Norwood, Teterboro, Teaneck, Lodi, Palisades Park, and Dumont. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for northeastern New Jersey...and southeastern New York.
